body.name: Yuasa YUAM720BH YTX20HL Factory Activated H Series AGM Battery
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
features: Yuasa YTX H Series batteries offer even more increased power with up to 30% more cold cranking amps
Advanced lead-calcium technology – holds its specific gravity more than 3 times longer than conventional lead antimony batteries
Absorbed Glass Mat (AGM) separators absorb electrolyte making the battery nonspillable, the valve regulated design eliminates water loss and the need for refilling
Factory Activated (FA) – the battery is filled with electrolyte, sealed and charged at the factory

Size/Weight - Length: 6 7/8 in (175 mm), Width: 3 7/16 in (87 mm), Height: 6 1/8 in (155 mm), Weight with Acid (lbs.): 15.1; Specs - Capacity Ah: 18 @ 10HR, Regular Charge Current (Amp): 1.8, C.C.A. @ 0 °F (-18 °C): 310
body.description: Yuasa YTX H Series batteries offer even more increased power with up to 30% more cold cranking amps. Advanced lead-calcium technology – holds its specific gravity more than 3 times longer than conventional lead antimony batteries. Absorbed Glass Mat (AGM) separators absorb electrolyte making the battery nonspillable, the valve regulated design eliminates water loss and the need for refilling. Factory Activated (FA) – the battery is filled with electrolyte, sealed and charged at the factory. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Fit correctly. 1st battery stopped working after 4 months. The seller honored the warranty and replaced it no charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This does not require acid, it's already added for you at the factory.
reviews.reviewText: This battery is the one that can be mounted vertical. Got it for my snowmobile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good Price, but you get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the stated dimensions are wrong. I believe they have listed the BOX'S dimensions, NOT the battery. I was initially happy that this did fit my 2006 Big Dog. However, the happiness soon ended. I started the bike, took it for a ride, and then (because winter just won't DIE here in MN) had to put it back in storage for MAYBE 3 weeks. During that time, in the heated garage, the battery lost full charge and could not be brought back to life no matter how many times I tried charging it (it would get back to full power, but would not maintain it long enough to give more than one attempt at turning the engine over). At Yuasa's suggestion, I took it to Batteries Plus to have them diagnose the issue. They confirmed it was already dead and then told me WHY these batteries are so cheap. Long story short, I wound up leaving the store with one of their batteries that had an unlimited 2 year warranty for about $10 more than this piece of junk. Amazon won't take my dead battery back (thankfully Batteries Plus did) but at least they refunded my money. There is NO WAY a new battery should die within a month (and ONE USE) of purchasing it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works well for HD nightord special 2014
reviews.reviewText: ordered and worked well for my 2014 HD nightrod special. polarity is correct and fitting is precise drop in replacement for HD stock batt.cranks the bike perfectly in first go and is working quite well in New York winter so far. maintains charge for atleast 1 week (or more).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fit. Glad to have the bike up and running again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quickly received.
reviews.reviewText: The main reason I got a new battery was my 2015 INDIAN Chief was very hard to start when temps dipped down into the low 30s. I found out it was a safety feature that the new battery did not rectify. However it works great at temps above 37.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bike battery on the market!
reviews.reviewText: Great battery! My OEM battery from Victory was also a Yuasa and I got 8 years out of it. It still had a charge when I swapped it out with this one. Hardest part was getting the old one out but plenty of YouTube vids to help with that. This came filled, sealed and charged out of the box. This is the best battery you can get for your bike!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great batteries, a little pricey.
reviews.reviewText: The company that sold this was on time and even a little early. The previous one lasted eight years! That is why I stick to this brand.

Bought this battery for a Ski-doo Renegade snowmobile because it was an exact match to what was in the machine from the factory. Obviously size was a consideration and, of course, it matched up perfect.
fit my 2016 outlander max xt perfectly . great seller.
It was kept up with Genius smart chargers but it was junk. It lasted 1500km in my Canadian sled and 13 months. Unacceptable. Don't buy it.
Was not disappointed this battery fit no problem, works great lots of cranking power.Super happy with it. 👍
Was here very fast. Days before estimated arrival. A good battery for the money.
